Michelle woke up. It was July 10, 2009. Today was her 16th birthday. She felt quite excited. She could already smell the pancakes.

"Happy Birthday"

There was no return address, nor name of the sender. She picked it up and pressed the button. A red laser shot out of it. She pointed it around the room. She pointed it at herself. The device then lit up to show her her personal details.

Name: Michelle Janice Richards
Height: 4' 10''
Physical birthday: July 10, 1993

Bra size: B
Shoe size: 16

"Ho hum" she thought. She noticed that she could edit it. She thought, "Hm, never thought of myself as a Michelle, more like Liz". She changed her name thusly.

"Liz, time to get up!", she heard her mother calling.

Did her mother just call her what she changed her name to?

112211.content:
Chris struggles to get up off the floor and looks up at Liz. He is completely frightened that his littler sister is now so much bigger than he is, so he runs off to tell his mother what just happened. On his way there, the effects of the reality device start to kick in. He no longer remembers his old life as the taller older brother. Instead he thinks he has always been 4'2" and his "little" sister was always 6'3". "Why did I punch her?" thinks Chris, "I know it would just make her mad. Oh well, I'll tell mom and she'll put Liz in her place."

"Mom! Mom!" Chris yells. "Liz hit me!"

"What's that, dear? Liz hit you? I'm sure she didn't mean it. You probably just got in the way of her elbows again."

Liz walks into the room, her head only inches from the top of the door frame. "Hi, mom."

"What's all this I hear about you hitting little Chris?"

"Oh, it's nothing mom. I just wasn't looking where I was going. You know it can be hard to see him since he's so small."

"But mom!" Chris yells. "She's lying! She did it on purpose!"

"Now, now Chris. I'm sure she didn't mean it," his mom says sympathetically, "You just have to look out where you're going. Now why don't you go hug your little sister and tell her you're sorry."

"But mom!"

"No buts. Just do what I said, young man."

Chris looks back at his sister. Liz has her arms already stretched out ready for the hug. "Come on little Chris, give your little sister a big hug." She's loving every moment of this. Chris begrudgingly hugs her. Liz pulls him in tighter against her stomach. In the process of the hug, she uses the device to expand her breasts a bit. They surge out and are now resting over the top of Chris's head. Just one of them is bigger than his head.

"Little Chris, is it just me or do you look taller than usual? Maybe you're finally getting that growth spurt." 1122111.content:
Liz takes Chris's hand and leads him up to her room. Chris is having trouble keep up with her long strides.

"Ok Chris, why don't you go stand over by the door." Liz fetches the measuring tape she always kept in her drawer. When she used to be 4'10", she would check her height every day hoping she would get taller. But now, it has other uses.

"Now how tall did you say you were Chris?" Liz gets on her knees so she can get a more accurate measurement.

"Umm, I've been 4'2" for years now. Do you really think I could be taller?"

"Maybe," says Liz. "Now stand up straight." As she's measuring him, she uses the device to shrink him 2 more inches. "Come on Chris. Stop slouching. I told you to stand up straight."

"I am!" Chris complains.

"Well this can't be right...

"What is it?"

"It says you're only 4 feet even."

"What?! There's no way!" Chris stands back and looks at the measurement. He's shocked at what he sees. "I've been 4'2 for years! That can't be right!"

"Now Chris..." Liz says, "I know you're short, but that doesn't give you an excuse to lie."

"But I..." He start to think about it. Was he really only 4'0" and he's been lying all this time? He rationalizes it as he must have told the lie so many times, he actually started to believe it."

"You know Chris, sometimes I feel like the older sister having to teach you your lessons. I guess I was wrong about your height though. You're not getting taller. In fact, in some ways, it seems like you shrunk." She laughs. "But it's still not very nice to lie, even if it's just about how tall you are"

"I know..." Chris looks up at Liz's imposing figure. He's far enough back that he can see her face over her breasts. After all these years he's still frightened of his "little" sister. His fear mixed with his shame of lying causes him to look down. "I'm sorry...I guess I just wanted to seem taller..."

"It's okay, little Chris. Just don't let it happen again. And look at me when I'm talking to you." She takes a step towards and puts her hands on her hips.

Chris looks up at her, barely able to see her face looking down at him past her breasts. "I'm sorry. It won't happen again."

"Good. Now, since I measured you, why don't you measure me? I've been feeling a lot taller lately." She hands him the measuring tape and stands next to the door.

He looks at the measuring tape and then back at Liz waiting to be measured. "Sis..."

"What is it? What are you waiting for?"

"Umm, I don't think I can reach..."

"Nonsense. You're not that short. Just try."

Chris tries to reach up to measure her, but his hands only reach to her shoulder level. Liz is enjoying every moment of this torture.

"See sis? There's no way I can reach."

Liz looks down at him and smiles. "Try standing on your toes. You can make it." Chris tries standing on his toes and reaching as far as he can, but still doesn't make it anywhere close to her head. Liz eventually gets tired of it and says, "Okay Chris, maybe you're shorter than I thought. Why don't you go get my chair and use it to measure me?"

Chris feels humiliated, but he knows better to disobey his sister. He brings the chair over next to her. He gets up on it and it looks like he can reach now. He starts to bring the measuring tape up to her head, but as he's just about to reach the top, Liz uses the device to make herself slowly grow taller. Liz is getting a kick out of watching him and can't help but smile. Every time he's just about reached, she grows a little bit, and he has to reach even farther. Eventually she stops when she's 7 feet tall, thankful for the tall ceilings.

Chris doesn't want to disappoint her again, so he keeps trying. Liz can see that he's trying to avoid touching her breasts while trying to measure. She uses the device again to make her boobs a little bigger. They surge forward and knock Chris off the chair and he falls to the ground. "Short and clumsy. What am I going to do with you, brother?"

"I'm sorry sis. I don't think I can reach even with the chair."

"Ugh..." She sighs. "Do I really have to do everything?" She bends down and picks him up so that he's eye level with her. "There. Now can you finally measure me?"

He reaches up and says, "Wow sis, you're 7 feet even. That's taller than I thought you were."

"Aww, that's sweet, Chris. I have been noticing I was getting taller lately." She puts him down on his feet and she's amazed that his head only comes up to the top of her hips. She giggles at how tiny he looks next to her.

Chris looks up and up and up at Liz, his mouth hanging open. Was she always this tall? Memories start to form in his mind. He now remembers having to watch his little sister grow and grow and grow. She's only 16 and already 7 feet tall with no sign of stopping.

Liz sees him staring at her. "What are you looking at?"

11221111.content:
Their mom calls from downstairs, "Chris. Liz. I'm leaving for work. You better be getting ready for school up there."

"Why don't you help me get ready for school, little Chris?" says Liz.

He always hated being called "little Chris." Every time he heard it, he'd get a little angrier inside. And this constant humiliation he was getting from her was just adding to it. He dare not show it though. He knows he stood no chance against her. He holds his anger in and responds, "Okay, what do you want me to help with?"

info.brief_description: Michelle has found a device that analyses your personal details and can change them.
info.description:
For her 16th birthday, Michelle has received a mysterious gift. It appears to be a laser, but when she points it at herself, it only shows her personal information. She decides to edit it as a joke, but it turns out that the device can actually change her.

She can change her name, her age, her height, any personal information about herself, and others. Other people will accept the change as if reality had always been that way.

She can edit...

Name
Height
Physical birthday
Mental birthday
Bra size (women only)
Shoe size
